humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'pNO' which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes. This matches with the new rule 11, which states N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report states 'pNO' which indicates that no cancer was found in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
